attributes.action: provide free personal care for the elderly on the same, or better, terms that apply in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Personal care for the elderly is free in Scotland whereas it is chargeable in England. This is clearly discriminatory and unfair on those who are often expected to sell their homes to fund their care.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
